Symbol.Script_3D:
! Vert Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- HORIZONTAL PRESSURE OPERATED CONDENSATE PUMP --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT -tankR, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -tankR, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT tankR, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, tankR, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -tankR, 0, tankL, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -tankR, tankL, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT tankR, 0, tankL, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, tankR, tankL, unID: unID=unID+1
vx=ConPosX_3 vy=ConPosY_3 GOSUB 100 L=MIN(tankR-topR, SQR(vx^2+vy^2))
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed
CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 913, tankR,360,4013
RESOL 10
ADD ConPosX_1,0,ConPosZ_1 REVOLVE 7,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_1/2, 2, 0,pipeR1, 2, 0.45*pipeL1,pipeR1, 2, 0.45*pipeL1,ConWidth_1/2, 2, pipeL1,ConWidth_1/2, 2, pipeL1,pipeR1, 2, ABS(ConPosX_1),pipeR1, 2 DEL 1
ADD ConPosX_2,0,ConPosZ_2 MULx -1 REVOLVE 7,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_2/2, 2, 0,pipeR2, 2, 0.45*pipeL2,pipeR2, 2, 0.45*pipeL2,ConWidth_2/2, 2, pipeL2,ConWidth_2/2, 2, pipeL2,pipeR2, 2, ABS(ConPosX_2),pipeR2, 2 DEL 2
! Valves dR=ZZYZX/3
RESOL 8 ROTz -90 ADDz pipeLowH + (tankL-pipeLowH)/2 ROTy 90
ADDx dR CYLIND 1.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR ADDz 1.15*tankR+1.5*valveR CYLIND valveR,valveR/2 ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 3
ADDx -dR CYLIND 1.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR ADDz 1.15*tankR+1.5*valveR CYLIND valveR,valveR/2 ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 3
DEL 1
ADD 1.15*tankR,0,-dR-1.1*valveR CYLIND 2*dR+2.2*valveR,1.1*valveR DEL 1
CUTEND CUTEND DEL 2
CUTEND
! Top RESOL res ADD L*COS(angle),L*SIN(angle), tankL CYLIND 0.05*ZZYZX, topR DEL 1
! Body RESOL res ROTy -90 REVOLVE 5,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, 0.85*tankR, 2, pipeLowH/2, 0.85*tankR, 2, 3*pipeLowH/4, 0.95*tankR, 2, pipeLowH, tankR, 2, tankL, tankR, 2 DEL 1
ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple
CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 913, tankR,360,4013
RESOL 6
ADD ConPosX_1,0,ConPosZ_1 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_1/2, 2, ABS(ConPosX_1),ConWidth_1/2, 2 DEL 1
ADD ConPosX_2,0,ConPosZ_2 MULx -1 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+16+32, 0,ConWidth_2/2, 2, ABS(ConPosX_2),ConWidth_2/2, 2 DEL 2
! Valves dR=ZZYZX/3
RESOL 6 ROTz -90 ADDz pipeLowH + (tankL-pipeLowH)/2 ROTy 90
ADDx dR CYLIND 1.15*tankR+2.5*valveR, valveR ADDz 1.15*tankR+1.5*valveR ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 3
ADDx -dR CYLIND 1.15*tankR+2.5*valveR, valveR ADDz 1.15*tankR+1.5*valveR ADDz valveR CYLIND valveR/5,2*valveR CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, valveR,360,4013 DEL 3
DEL 1
ADD 1.15*tankR,0,-dR-1.1*valveR CYLIND 2*dR+2.2*valveR,1.1*valveR DEL 1
CUTEND CUTEND DEL 2
CUTEND
! Top RESOL res ADD L*COS(angle),L*SIN(angle), tankL CYLIND 0.05*ZZYZX, topR DEL 1
! Body RESOL res ROTy -90 REVOLVE 4,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, 0.85*tankR, 2, pipeLowH/2, 0.85*tankR, 2, ! 3*pipeLowH/4, 0.95*tankR, 2, pipeLowH, tankR, 2, tankL, tankR, 2 DEL 1
ENDIF
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 14, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 14, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 1, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 1
END
100: IF ABS(vx) < EPS THEN IF vy > 0 THEN angle = 90 ELSE angle = 270 ENDIF ELSE angle = ATN (vy / vx) IF vx >= 0 THEN IF angle >= 0 THEN angle = angle ELSE angle = 360 + angle ENDIF ELSE IF anglex > 0 THEN angle = 180 + angle ELSE angle = 180 + angle ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Vert Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
hID = 1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- HORIZONTAL PRESSURE OPERATED CONDENSATE PUMP --- !
!project2 3,270,2 !pen 10 !gs_fill_pen=10 !fill 1
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 -tankR, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -tankR, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 tankR, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, tankR, unID: unID=unID+1
! IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -tankR,0, 1, 0, 1, 801, -SQR(tankR^2-(ConWidth_1/2)^2),ConWidth_1/2, 1001, -tankR,ConWidth_1/2, 0
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -tankR,0, 1, 0, -1, 801, -SQR(tankR^2-(ConWidth_1/2)^2),-ConWidth_1/2, 1001, -tankR,-ConWidth_1/2, 0
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, tankR,0, 1, 0, 1, 801, SQR(tankR^2-(ConWidth_2/2)^2),ConWidth_2/2, 1001, tankR,ConWidth_2/2, 0
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, tankR,0, 1, 0, -1, 801, SQR(tankR^2-(ConWidth_2/2)^2),-ConWidth_2/2, 1001, tankR,-ConWidth_2/2, 0
POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0, 901, tankR,360, 4001
! Top vx=ConPosX_3 vy=ConPosY_3 GOSUB 100 L=MIN(tankR-topR, SQR(vx^2+vy^2)) CIRCLE2 L*COS(angle),L*SIN(angle),topR
! Valve cx=SQR(tankR^2-valveR^2)
ROT2 -90 ADD2 tankR, 0 POLY2_B 12, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -tankR+cx, valveR, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR/2, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, valveR/2, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, 2*valveR, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR+valveR/5, 2*valveR, 1,
0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR+valveR/5, -2*valveR, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, -2*valveR, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, -valveR/2, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, -valveR/2, 1, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, -valveR, 1, -tankR+cx, -valveR, 1
LINE2 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, valveR/2, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR, -valveR/2 LINE2 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, valveR/2, 0.15*tankR+1.5*valveR+valveR, -valveR/2
POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.15*tankR,0,901, 1.1*valveR,360,4001 DEL 2 ! ENDIF ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
DEL TOP ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdgeVisible_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdgeVisible_2 = 0, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 5, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 5 DEL 1
END
100: IF ABS(vx) < EPS THEN IF vy > 0 THEN angle = 90 ELSE angle = 270 ENDIF ELSE angle = ATN (vy / vx) IF vx >= 0 THEN IF angle >= 0 THEN angle = angle ELSE angle = 360 + angle ENDIF ELSE IF anglex > 0 THEN angle = 180 + angle ELSE angle = 180 + angle ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Vert Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
maxCW = B/2 IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF maxCW = B/2 IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
pipeR1=0.8*ConWidth_1 pipeL1=2*ConWidth_1
pipeR2=0.8*ConWidth_2 pipeL2=2*ConWidth_2
maxPipe=MAX(pipeR1, pipeR2)
pipeLowH = MIN(0.2*ZZYZX, MIN(ConPosZ_1-pipeR1, ConPosZ_2-pipeR2))
tankR=A/2 tankL=0.95*ZZYZX
dTop=SQR((ConPosX_3-ConPosX_4)^2+(ConPosY_3-ConPosY_4)^2) topR=MIN(0.95*tankR, 1.2*(dTop+ConWidth_4/2))
valveR=0.0125
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Vert Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Vert Pressure Operated Condensate Pump
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 0.10 VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,] IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF
B = A PARAMETERS B = B LOCK "B"
minH = 5*maxPipe VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConPosZ_1 > tankL-pipeR1 THEN ConPosZ_1 = tankL-pipeR1 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE[2*maxPipe, tankL-pipeR1]
IF ConPosZ_2 > tankL-pipeR2 THEN ConPosZ_2 = tankL-pipeR2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE[2*maxPipe, tankL-pipeR2]
VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_3/2, B/2-ConWidth_3/2] VALUES "ConPosY_3" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_3/2, B/2-ConWidth_3/2] VALUES "ConPosZ_3" RANGE [5*maxPipe,] VALUES "ConPosX_4" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_4/2, B/2-ConWidth_4/2] VALUES "ConPosY_4" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_4/2, B/2-ConWidth_4/2] VALUES "ConPosZ_4" RANGE [5*maxPipe,] IF ConPosX_3>B/2-ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosX_3=B/2-ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3 ENDIF IF ConPosX_3<-B/2+ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosX_3=-B/2+ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3 ENDIF IF ConPosY_3>B/2-ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosY_3=B/2-ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3 ENDIF IF ConPosY_3<-B/2+ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosY_3=-B/2+ConWidth_3/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3 ENDIF IF ConPosX_4>B/2-ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosX_4=B/2-ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4 ENDIF IF ConPosX_4<-B/2+ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosX_4=-B/2+ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4 ENDIF IF ConPosY_4>B/2-ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosY_4=B/2-ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4 ENDIF IF ConPosY_4<-B/2+ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosY_4=-B/2+ConWidth_4/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4 ENDIF
ConPosX_1=-tankR PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1
ConPosX_2=tankR PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="ConPosZ_3" THEN ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_3 ZZYZX=ConPosZ_3 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4 PARAMETERS ZZYZX=ZZYZX ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="ConPosZ_4" THEN ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_4 ZZYZX=ConPosZ_4 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3 PARAMETERS ZZYZX=ZZYZX ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" THEN ConPosZ_3=ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3 ConPosZ_4=ZZYZX PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4 ENDIF ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Труба Впускного Соединения `
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = B/2 minCW = 0
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<minCW THEN ConWidth_1=minCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=minCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Труба Выпускного Соединения`
ConDVecX = 1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = B/2
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<minCW THEN ConWidth_2=minCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=minCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = B/3
VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_3<minCW THEN ConWidth_3=minCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=minCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_3>maxCW THEN ConWidth_3=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 4th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = B/3
VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_4<minCW THEN ConWidth_4=minCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=minCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_4>maxCW THEN ConWidth_4=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
